subcategory: Monitoring, Data Collection and Submission to the Agency
description:
(i) The Licence Holder shall provide and use a standard dip meter or recording instrument approved by the Agency.

(ii) The Licence Holder shall maintain any <<dip meter/ recording instrument>>, and if necessary replace it, in such a condition so as to ensure that accurate measurements of the level of water in the <<borehole/boreholes>> <<is/are>> recorded at all times.

(iii) The Licence Holder shall calibrate any dip meter regularly, in accordance with the recommendations of the manufacturer or at any time when required to do so by the Agency and shall replace it as necessary.
